text: Hey everyone, how do you handle large bundles of JS (larger than 1.5MB)? I'm working on a migration from a custom CMS to HubSpot and the current JS bundle is almost 2MB.

Hi, I am trying to fetch the records from diff objects using my java code, I'm able to fetch some but for some I'm getting an error  You do not have permissions to view object type ObjectTypeId{legacyObjectType=TICKET} in portal 45484290 (requires one of [tickets-read, tickets-access]). using the sq query "SELECT * FROM Tickets". Can anybody help me to resolve the same and what may be the issue
Is it possible to log in to your database server using a user account with administrative privileges?
